[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums Privacy Change - Continued[/color][/b]
In light of [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient's[/color][/b][/url] recent announcement:
[quote]
I just want members to be aware we may have some privacy changes coming and that I do plan on being GDPR compliant.
[/quote]


[list]
[*][b]What is GDPR?[/b] - The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a legal framework that sets guidelines for the collection and processing of personal information of individuals within the European Union (EU). [size=xx-small][url=https://www.investopedia.com/terms/g/general-data-protection-regulation-gdpr.asp]>>source[/url][/size]
[/list]

[list]
[*][b]GDPR Overview[/b] - The aim of the GDPR is to protect all EU citizens from privacy and data breaches in an increasingly data-driven world that is vastly different from the time in which the 1995 directive was established. Although the key principles of data privacy still hold true to the previous directive, many changes have been proposed to the regulatory policies. [size=xx-small][url=https://www.eugdpr.org/key-changes.html]>>source[/url][/size]
[/list]

In a recent update, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has announced the removal of birthdays from member profiles in an effort to be compliant with the new GDPR law. The age restriction has also been changed to 16.

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5836794]>>see thread[/url][/size]

[hr]

[b][color=#ffffff]Best Decentralized Exchanges[/color][/b]
Have you ever wished there was a nicely compiled list between members of Hack Forums detailing all the best decentralized exchanges officially recognized by our very own [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]? Well wish no more, my very specific fellow wish-makers, a discussion thread has been made with that very list! 

Members are freely able to discuss decentralized exchanges here: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5842124

Some exchanges currently listed are:
[quote]
https://wavesplatform.com/ (Works great)

https://wallet.crypto-bridge.org/ (Works great)

https://www.airswap.io/ (untested)

https://idex.market/ [ERC-20 Tokens Only] (untested)
[/quote]

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5842124]>>see thread[/url][/size]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Memo.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Recruitment Ended[/color][/b]
I'm reviewing all applications and no one has been invited just yet. Expect responses within the next 2 weeks.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Study Links Aging of the Brain to Depression[/color][/b] 
Psychologists at the University of Sussex have recently published a comprehensive review of 34 separate studies. The most notable is a discovered correlation between the aging of the brain and depression. They found that those with depression or high anxiety had a marked increase in dementia in later life. They also found those that were diagnosed with clinical depression experienced a much more severe cognitive decline in old age. The lead authors of this paper, Dr. Darya Gaysina, and Amber John have high hopes for the data aggregated here "Our findings should give the government even more reason to take mental health issues seriously and to ensure that health provisions are properly resourced. We need to protect the mental wellbeing of our older adults and to provide robust support services to those experiencing depression and anxiety in order to safeguard brain function in later life." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2018-05/uos-dsu052318.php]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Anti-Seizure Bacteria in Diet Identified[/color][/b] 
Researchers at the University of California, Los Angeles have isolated the bacteria that provides anti-seizure benefits in the ketogenic diet. The high-fat, low-carbohydrate ketogenic diet has far more benefits than just being used to aid those resistant to traditional seizure medications as well. In their testing on mice, the team found that this bacterium has the ability to alter the chemistry of the stomach in as soon as four days since introduction. The team also accurately hypothesized that the diet would no longer be a good preventative measure should this bacteria be removed. [i][size=x-small][url=http://newsroom.ucla.edu/releases/gut-bacteria-play-critical-role-in-anti-seizure-effects-of-ketogenic-diet-ucla-scientists-report]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Tick Encased in Spider Silk Becomes Focal Point of Researchers[/color][/b] 
An estimated 99 million years ago, this tick fell prey to a lucky spider. The tick then became enveloped in tree resin as it began to struggle for its life. This is what preserved it for those millions of years. This fossil is so notable because it is the first ever of this type to be discovered. The article goes on to describe how many other insects have been studied previously, however not anything in the process of being wrapped. This miraculous discovery comes from Myanmar's amber mines that are also huge in the jewelry trade business. The previous owner was happy to sell the fossil to the Berlin Museum of Natural History where it currently resides. [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.nationalgeographic.com/2018/05/fossils-ticks-spiders-dinosaurs-amber-cretaceous-science/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Elon Musk wants to rate journalists. He'd call his site 'Pravda'[/color][/b] 
Billionaire CEO of Tesla and SpaceX Elon Musk wants to create a site where the public can rate journalists. Musk’s inspiration is fueled by his perception of dishonest journalists and news anchors. On Wednesday, Musk touched on the possibility of “building a service to rathe the credibility of specific journalists and news outlets.” Musk’s intent with the site would be to provide a place where those interested can rate and keep track of the rating scale for each “[writer], editor & publication,” in an effort to help battle bias and unfair news coverage. The service would be called Pravda, according to Elon. In Russian, “Pravda” means “truth,” which is the end goal for his possible aspiration regarding this. In late 2017, a California business erected and was being led by president Jared Birchall, who has filing connections with Musk for numerous other projects, one significant business being The Boring Company, which released a limited-time “Not A Flamethrower,” selling over 20,000 units in under a month’s time. Though with Musk’s idea, comes the realistic aspect of it being a fair source. Many “raised concerns that the reputation of news organizations and reporters could be determined by what could be an easy to manipulate online popular vote.” However, his idea also received praise. Siva Vaidhyanathan, “a media studies professor at the University of Virginia, told CNN such a service might make sense if it employed a careful methodology and was overseen by an independent journalism foundation.”  [i][size=x-small][url=http://money.cnn.com/2018/05/23/technology/elon-musk-media/index.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]North Korea says It’s willing to meet with the U.S. at any time[/color][/b] 
After President Trump’s ultimate decision to abandon the June-scheduled summit with North Korea in Singapore on Thursday, “North Korea’s First Vice Foreign Minister Kim Kye Gwan said Friday that his country still wanted to pursue peace and said it would give Washington more time to reconsider talks.” Additionally, Gwan added the “North Korea ‘inwardly highly appreciated’ Trump for agreeing to the summit, and hoped the ‘Trump formula’ would help lead to a deal between the adversaries.” North Korea is seeming to make a valiant effort to amend differences with the United States, and potentially mark themselves on the figurative map as a non-rogue at once.  Both parties are aware that, if the summit will be held, progress would be slow. In a comment provided by Gwan, North Korea is aware the “first meeting would not solve all, but solving even one at a time in a phased way would make the relations get better rather than making them get worse.” President Trump responded to the statement by describing it as “very good news” and “warm.” Trump’s intentions are apparently clear, according to Twitter where he wrote, “[we] will soon see where it will lead, hopefully to a long and enduring prosperity and peace.” In the world of politics, Trump’s decision to cancel the summit was taken numerous ways. Two of those to possibly embarrass North Korea and to prove to North Korea, that, if the United States were to reschedule, that our hands are firm and will not be budged. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-05-24/trump-calls-cancellation-of-kim-summit-setback-for-world]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/uVQrGNh.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Far Cry 5: Hours of Darkness is set for early June[/color][/b] 
There will be three DLC packs in total that will be released for Far Cry 5. The latest and first DLC packed which was titled, "Hours of Darkness" will be coming out this June. This cool little pack will take you across the world to Asia where you will be in Vietnam where you will play as Wendell "Red" Redler. New guns will be implemented into the DLC, allowing for more customization to your arsenal to help you in the main goal which is to save captured comrades. The timeframe of the DLC will be during the Vietnam War, so you will have to fight your way through the jungles. Some cool additions are the introduction of an air bombing system where you can strike your enemies from the skies using an air strike. Lastly, you can obtain skills that assist you to take down your foes and increase the percent of a successful, stealthy mission. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/far-cry-5-hours-of-darkness-is-set-for-early-june/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]School shooting game Active Shooter appears on Steam, draws widespread condemnation[/color][/b] 
School shootings have been occurring more and more frequently and it is quite terrifying. Nobody knows when the next attack will be and that makes it even scarier. This June, a new game will be released on steam called "Active Shooter." You have the chance to play as an active shooter or a SWAT team member to try and take the enemy down. A UK-based charity by the name of Infer Trust is already trying to ban the game off of Steam as they believe it is highly inappropriate. Believe it or not, but many people support the game while others believe that Infer Trust is correct and that the game should not be put up for sale. The [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/866890/Active_Shooter/Steam page]Steam page[/url] of the game is still active, and pre-orders are open. There was an announcement made by the developers due to the fact that the game brought so much attention to itself. You can read that [url=https://steamcommunity.com/games/866890/announcements/detail/1645382750018785881]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/school-shooting-game-active-shooter-appears-on-steam-draws-widespread-condemnation/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Eromanga Sensei's Elf Yamada Gets Her Own Spinoff Manga[/color][/b] 
Elf Yamada who is one of everyone's favorite loli from Eromanga Sensei is now getting her very own manga spin-off. Kadokawa made the announcement of this spin-off on a live stream this past Friday, May 25. The staff members presenting the manga spin-off had the pleasure of sharing that this is Eromanga Sensei's very first spin-off and they are very excited to share the news. Those working on the manga spin-off will start getting to work this July 27 in order to prepare for its official release this September. Tsukasa Fushimi launched the light novel series of Eromanga Sensei back in 2013 after he finished writing the Oreimo light novel series. The anime adaption of the LN premiered last year, 2017, in April.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-05-25/eromanga-sensei-elf-yamada-gets-her-own-spinoff-manga/.132046]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2018-05-25/re-zero-rem-figure-dons-white-kimono/.131830[/color][/b] 
The very cute Kuroneko will be getting a brand new statue, however, there are only a limited amount of sales for this statue. Scheduled to only have been produced 10 times, the statue was first shown back in 2016 by FigureX. After two years, the 10 figures are ready for sale. Ruri "Kuroneko" Gokō is known for her role in the Oreimo series. The statues are said to be life-sized, and those interested have a chance of pre-ordering it starting June 1 to June 17. Kuroneko is wearing a cute, pink, frilly lolita dress with white thigh highs. In addition, she is in a cute meowing cat pose. The official release date of the life-size figure is planned to be sometime in Nov. 2019. Last years figure release was the beautiful Ayase's figure which shipped this past January.  You can take a [url=https://i.imgur.com/QgLM6HO.jpg]look[/url] at the figure in the process of being made to get an idea of how big the Kuroneko figure will be. With only 10 figures to be released, will you be one of the lucky ones? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2018-05-25/oreimo-life-size-kuroneko-statue-goes-on-pre-order-with-only-10-planned/.131969]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Non Non Biyori Vacation Anime Film's Ad Streamed[/color][/b] 
Kadokawa streamed a commercial of the Non Non Biyori Vacation movie that will be released in theatres August 25. The commercial was aired May 24 and showcases a 15-second clip with a very cute voice-over that you can watch [url=https://youtu.be/CjcUUvvHj88]here[/url]. In addition to the commercial for the movie itself, there was also a commercial for the [url=https://youtu.be/BpeuTWDIk6A]blu-ray[/url] release too. The Hack Forums News previously covered an article on the movie, but for those who may have missed it feel free to continue reading. The movie is set to open up in 27 different theatres in Japan in August. There is no information on when the delayed viewings will be held on, but most likely it will be a year or two before the movie will be shown in places outside of Japan. The story will take place during the Okinawa Trip Arc trip. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-05-24/non-non-biyori-vacation-anime-film-ad-streamed/.131950]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Harukana Receive Anime's 'Pair Visual' Shows Naruasa Team[/color][/b] 
A new visual pair was released for the anime Harukana Receive. Of course, we are not just talking about the big pair of breasts in the [url=https://i.imgur.com/KnHlM7U.jpg]picture[/url], but kind of we are.  Narumi Tōi (Miyuri Shimabukuro) and Ayasa Tachibana (Kanae Itō) are shown together on the beach playing a game of beach volleyball. This anime will be coming out this July and will be about two girls who come together to form a beach volleyball duo. Both the girls have something they dislike about themselves, but the two come together to form a pair called "Naruasa." Will the two be able to get passed their self-conscious ideas of themselves and overcome it? You will have to see this July! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/daily-briefs/2018-05-24/harukana-receive-anime-pair-visual-shows-naruasa-team/.131919]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
